噂: (そん) - Rumor, boato, fofoca, notícias, mexerico, conversa comum
噂が流れる: (うわさがながれる) - to have rumors going around; to have rumors spread
噂に上る: (うわさにのぼる) - to be gossiped about
噂をすれば影: (うわさをすればかげ) - (proverb)  speak of the devil
噂をすれば影がさす: (うわさをすればかげがさす) - (proverb) speak of the devil and he shall appear; speak rumours of someone and they shall appear
噂をすれば影が射す: (うわさをすればかげがさす) - (proverb) speak of the devil and he shall appear; speak rumours of someone and they shall appear
噂を流す: (うわさをながす) - to spread rumors; to spread rumours
噂を立てられる: (うわさをたてられる) - to be gossiped about
噂を聞く: (うわさをきく) - to hear a rumor; to get wind of
噂通り: (うわさどおり) - rumor that appears to be quite true (rumour)
